alert.note: Alert for Grayson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 02 at 3:59PM CST until March 02 at 4:30PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN GRAYSON COUNTY... At 358 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sherman, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Heavy ping pong sized hail was reported in Sherman at 357 PM. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sherman, Denison, Howe, Pottsboro, Whitewright, Bells, Tom Bean, Knollwood, Dorchester, Valley Lake, Southmayd, Boddie, Ida, Ambrose, Luella, White Mound and Carpenters Bluff. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for north central Texas.
